title: Reverse Investigator

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will receive 5 random players, at least two of which are Town members and at least one of which opposes the Town. One of them will be converted into the role you chose, but they keep their current faction and goal.
- Investigating the same role again will not do anything.
- Your results can only contain players that exist.
- Rule 16 applies to your ability.
